welcome_message_body: Welcome to Morong, Philippines! Known for its stunning beaches and rich history, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves international and domestic flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights for Cebu Pacific and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for regional and smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but connection may be slow during peak hours.
